args.content:
import Mathlib
open BigOperators

theorem cauchy_product_real {a b : ℕ → ℝ}
  (ha : Summable fun n => |a n|) (hb : Summable b) :
  (Summable fun n => ∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k)) ∧
    tsum (fun n => ∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k)) = (tsum a) * (tsum b) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open BigOperators

theorem cauchy_product_real {a b : ℕ → ℝ}
  (ha : Summable (fun n => |a n|)) (hb : Summable b) :
  (Summable (fun n => (∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k)))) ∧
    tsum (fun n => (∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k))) = (tsum a) * (tsum b) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open BigOperators

theorem cauchy_product_real {a b : ℕ → ℝ}
  (ha : Summable (fun n => Real.abs (a n))) (hb : Summable b) :
  (Summable (fun n => ∑ k : Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k))) ∧
    tsum (fun n => ∑ k : Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k)) = (tsum a) * (tsum b) := by sorry

import Mathlib
open BigOperators

theorem cauchy_product_real {a b : ℕ → ℝ}
  (ha : Summable fun n => abs (a n)) (hb : Summable b) :
  (Summable fun n => ∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k)) ∧
    tsum (fun n => ∑ k in Finset.range (n + 1), a k * b (n - k)) = (tsum a) * (tsum b) := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib
open BigOperators

theorem cauchy_product_real {a b : ℕ → ℝ}
  (ha : Summable fun n => abs (a n)) (hb : Summable b) :
  (Summable fun n => Finset.sum (Finset.range (n + 1)) (fun k => a k * b (n - k))) ∧
    tsum (fun n => Finset.sum (Finset.range (n + 1)) (fun k => a k * b (n - k))) = (tsum a) * (tsum b) := by sorry
